name: Way-z
description:
Help a player to pave the way to the finish in a puzzle-game Way-Z. Minimal design, many interesting levels, various obstacles and elements of control are waiting for you. Use sliders and portals, move in different directions, find creative solutions. Way-Z is not as simple as it may seem. The game is a great choice for the people who like to reflect on challenges - from kids to adults. It will let you spend your time wisely.

▪ Simple control
▪ 60 Levels
▪ Original soundtrack
▪ Minimal design
